book.synopsis: In 1945, the technology of death was mastered, and mankind entered an era that could be its last. But Nature evolves its own defense, and children with amazing mental talents have been born. They are the metapsychic operants--and they have the power to rule the world. An amazing new series from the author of The Saga of Pliocene Exile. HC: Houghton Mifflin.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.4 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
